name: Cure the Roots
description:
A short and sweet fairy tale of a mouse wizard faced with an unsurmountable task.

Rooty the shy is the current caretaker of the village's mother tree. One day, she finds out about a terrible disease corrupting the tree from deep within the earth. She has no choice: she completes a ritual and goes on a journey to save her home.

This narrative card game was created by Team 7 Capybara Gamedżemiara: Mivinka (3D environment), Zofia Wołoszyn (2D art/UI), Rafał Towalski (Programming), Agata Kunecka (Game design/UX), Frey Stępień (Writing/UI/2D art), with Sensei Manuel Somonte
